page.title: 18CONSTANTINE EMPLOYMENT
page.content: EMPLOYMENT;Many of the male population work on the farms or in thetowns of Falmouth,Helston or Truro.They work in the Docks or in light industrial factories at PENRYN or TRURO.Many of the men are also in the building trade.A few work in the BOSAHAN QUARRY cutting granite into thin slices for facing buildings.Granite from this quarry built LONDON BRIDGE and the Thames Barrage.Many of the female population work atsecretarial tasks or are employed in the tourist industry or shops around the area.There is some Cottage industry knitting and printing for the Craft cooperative recently established in Constantine. UNEMPLOYMENT;This is high at the present time because of redundancy at the docks.It is about 17 to 18 % of the population of 2000 .
